nushi_dragon_0020_friend_02:

Wait, is it even a dragon? Or is it a fish?![npcn:6]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_05: Th-the little sushi guy got eaten up by the Titan?![npcn:6]

Yeesh! Didn’t expect to see the food chain in
action today![npcn:6]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_09:
Now that the Titan’s taken care of, next up on
the menu is that Herba Mystica...[npcn:6]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_11:
Whoa! The little sushi guy escaped without
becoming that thing’s lunch![npcn:6]
nushi_dragon_0020_friend_12: What—?! Does that thing wanna fight, too?![npcn:6]
